General.Name: Sichuan Fulin Transportation Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Sichuan Fulin Transportation Group Co., Ltd. engages in the road passenger transport services and station services in China. The company provides passenger, travel, charter, car rental, repair, and ticket inquiry, as well as advertising services. It also offers taxi and urban bus operations, vehicle maintenance, driver training, insurance concurrent agency, and other related services, as well as after-sales services, logistics, and tourisms. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Chengdu, China.
